about_the_game:
The Digital Sound Factory - Orchestral Stacks is a collection of orchestral instruments designed for Cakewalk’s Rapture Pro and Rapture Session virtual instruments. This sound expansion features the Seattle Symphony recorded at the Benaroya Hall and the Bastyr Cathedral. Various size sections and styles were sampled, combined, and programmed to create this ultimate orchestral collection. Utilizing the powerful Rapture synthesizer engine, sound parameters are mapped to real time controls allowing for quick custom edits. Programs include the authentic sounds as well as combination stacks rendering rich luscious sounds. Orchestral textures provide movement that inspires creativity.

Specifications:
2,300 samples (1.87 GB)
Resolution: 48 kHz, 16-bit
Programs: 130 Programs
Compatibility: Rapture Pro, Rapture Session
Instrument Page controls: Filter, Resonance, Tube, FX Amount, Amp Attack, Amp Release EQ, Individual Instrument Volumes, and more
Special features: Professional Orchestra recorded in two different Concert Halls.

This sound expansion features the Seattle Symphony recorded at the Benaroya Hall and the Bastyr Cathedral. Programs include the authentic sounds as well as combination stacks rendering rich luscious sounds. Orchestral textures provide movement that inspires creativity.

legal_notice: 4/28/15 - All STEAM purchases of Rapture Pro are Windows only. If/when we are able to offer the Mac version via STEAM, all owners will be given access.
name: Digital Sound Factory - Orchestral Stacks

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 (32/64-bit), Windows 8 (32/64-bit), Windows 10 (32/64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.6GHz Intel or AMD multi-core processor
  • Graphics: 1280x800 (1920 x 1080+ recommended)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: ASIO compatible hardware is recommended

short_description: The Digital Sound Factory - Orchestral Stacks is a collection of orchestral instruments designed for Cakewalk’s Rapture Pro and Rapture Session virtual instruments. This sound expansion features the Seattle Symphony recorded at the Benaroya Hall and the Bastyr Cathedral.
